title: The Wet Traveler's Clothes
summary: The party pushed deeper into the Redbrand hideout, discovering Talon—the lost sword of Ser Aldith Trezendar. But the true legend was born when Belden, fighting Redbrands in a cistern, grabbed wet traveler's clothes and used them as an improvised weapon. He strangled one Redbrand, then 'rat-tailed' another—whipping the wet clothes at his throat and slicing it clean open. The session ended in the Tresendar crypts, battling skeleton guardians among ancient sarcophagi.

best_moments.title: The Wet Traveler's Clothes Whip
best_moments.description: Belden grabbed wet traveler's clothes from the cistern and used them as an improvised weapon. He rat-tailed a Redbrand, whipping the wet clothes at his throat and slicing it clean open. This became an instant campaign legend.

quotes.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes.text: Do you know what a rat tail is? Where you spin the clothes or the towel to get it nice and tight, and then I'm going to whip it at him. Specifically at the throat.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: WAPOW! 18 is going to hit. Belden, how would you like to describe this kill?

quotes.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes.text: I get the rat tail ready and just flick it at his throat. It slices clean open, he just bleeds out from the neck.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: The wet traveler's clothes is the last thing he sees.

quotes.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes.text: I didn't use my hammer once at all. I fought the whole thing with traveler's clothes.

best_moments.title: Valrex's Undertaker Chokeslam
best_moments.description: Valrex grabbed a Redbrand by the throat, strangled him one-handed, and threw his dead body back into the cistern like the Undertaker.

quotes.speaker: Darren/Valrex
quotes.text: I grab him by the throat, I pick him up and strangle him in one hand, and I toss his dead body back in the cistern.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: This is like the Undertaker style—grabbing someone and picking them up off the ground and chokeslamming them back into the cistern.

best_moments.title: Talon Recovered
best_moments.description: Valrex discovered the legendary sword Talon in a chest at the bottom of the crevasse—the lost blade of Ser Aldith Trezendar, the Black Hawk.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: It's inscribed with the name Talon, and the hilt is worked in the shape of a bird of prey with outstretched wings.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: This once belonged to a great knight named Aldith Trezendar, known as the Black Hawk. He died fighting off the bandits that attacked through these hidden caverns below his manor.

best_moments.title: Belden Tests the Trap
best_moments.description: Belden spotted a trapped bridge, announced he would test how well the trap was made, walked across it, and front-flipped to safety as it collapsed.

quotes.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes.text: This is the session that I've decided that if there's a trap as Belden, I must test to see how well the trap is made.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: You feel all the pieces of wood start falling beneath you, and you cut a front flip off to the other side of the bridge. Easy.

best_moments.title: Tresendar Crypts
best_moments.description: The party entered the ancient crypts, fighting skeleton guardians among stone sarcophagi of the Tresendar nobles.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Three massive stone sarcophagi stand along the edges of the wall, each etched with the likeness of Tresendar nobles.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: You see six skeletons in rusty mail, propped up against the wall as if they're guarding the place.

best_moments.title: Skeleton Shrapnel
best_moments.description: Belden smashed a skeleton so hard that its breastplate flew off and damaged another skeleton behind it.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: You see the breastplate fly off of this skeleton and smash into the one behind it doing 4 shrapnel damage.

best_moments.title: Valrex's Head Collection
best_moments.description: Valrex finished a skeleton by commanding his Spiritual Weapon to slice one, then turning around, grabbing another skeleton's head, kicking its body away, and discarding the skull.

quotes.speaker: Darren/Valrex
quotes.text: He just turns around, grabs the head of the skeleton, kicks the body off, leaving just the head in my hands. And I just discard the head on the ground.
